trans-unit.source: Azure account
trans-unit.target: Azure account

trans-unit.source: You need an Azure account to complete the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You need an Azure account to complete the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You can:
trans-unit.target: You can:

trans-unit.source: [Open an Azure account for free](/pricing/free-trial/?WT.mc_id=A261C142F).
trans-unit.target: [Open an Azure account for free](/pricing/free-trial/?WT.mc_id=A261C142F).

trans-unit.source: You get credits that can be used to try out paid Azure services.
trans-unit.target: You get credits that can be used to try out paid Azure services.

trans-unit.source: Even after the credits are used up, you can keep the account and use free Azure services and features.
trans-unit.target: Even after the credits are used up, you can keep the account and use free Azure services and features.

trans-unit.source: [Activate Visual Studio subscriber benefits](/pricing/member-offers/msdn-benefits-details/?WT.mc_id=A261C142F).
trans-unit.target: [Activate Visual Studio subscriber benefits](/pricing/member-offers/msdn-benefits-details/?WT.mc_id=A261C142F).

trans-unit.source: Your MSDN subscription gives you credits every month that you can use for paid Azure services.
trans-unit.target: Your MSDN subscription gives you credits every month that you can use for paid Azure services.

trans-unit.source: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before you sign up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751).
trans-unit.target: If you want to get started with Azure App Service before you sign up for an Azure account, go to [Try App Service](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=523751).

trans-unit.source: There, you can immediately create a short-lived starter app in App Service — no credit card required, and no commitments.
trans-unit.target: There, you can immediately create a short-lived starter app in App Service — no credit card required, and no commitments.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 with the Azure SDK for .NET
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 with the Azure SDK for .NET

trans-unit.source: The tutorial is written for Visual Studio 2015 with the [Azure SDK for .NET](../articles/dotnet-sdk.md) 2.8.2 or later.
trans-unit.target: The tutorial is written for Visual Studio 2015 with the [Azure SDK for .NET](../articles/dotnet-sdk.md) 2.8.2 or later.

trans-unit.source: [Download the latest Azure SDK for Visual Studio 2015 here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=518003).
trans-unit.target: [Download the latest Azure SDK for Visual Studio 2015 here](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=518003).

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio is automatically installed with the SDK if you don't already have it.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio is automatically installed with the SDK if you don't already have it.

trans-unit.source: If you have Visual Studio 2013, you can [download the latest Azure SDK for Visual Studio 2013](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=324322).
trans-unit.target: If you have Visual Studio 2013, you can [download the latest Azure SDK for Visual Studio 2013](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=324322).

trans-unit.source: Some screens may look different from the illustrations.
trans-unit.target: Some screens may look different from the illustrations.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Depending on how many of the SDK dependencies you already have on your machine, installing the SDK could take a long time, from several minutes to a half hour or more.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Depending on how many of the SDK dependencies you already have on your machine, installing the SDK could take a long time, from several minutes to a half hour or more.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET MVC 5
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET MVC 5

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is about using ASP.NET MVC 5 with Azure App Service; it doesn't teach how to develop an ASP.NET web application.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is about using ASP.NET MVC 5 with Azure App Service; it doesn't teach how to develop an ASP.NET web application.

trans-unit.source: For an introduction to ASP.NET MVC 5, see [Getting Started with ASP.NET MVC 5](http://www.asp.net/mvc/overview/getting-started/introduction/getting-started) on the [ASP.NET](http://asp.net/) site.
trans-unit.target: For an introduction to ASP.NET MVC 5, see [Getting Started with ASP.NET MVC 5](http://www.asp.net/mvc/overview/getting-started/introduction/getting-started) on the [ASP.NET](http://asp.net/) site.
